summary: A weekend boating party turns into a nightmare for a group of young Londoners when they stumble upon a terrifying secret hidden in the reeds.
cast: Anna Brewster|Geoff Bell|Daniel Caltagirone|Emma Catherwood|O-T Fagbenle|Scarlett Alice Johnson|Will Mellor|Scarlett Sabet|Natai Pauwels|Karl Ashman|Reece Chapman|James Marriot
keywords: party|impaled|large map on wall|argument|electronic music score
title: The Reeds
